question:
You have just read an article in an international travel magazine which contained some information about your town that is incorrect. 
Write a letter to editor of magazine 
Correct the information in article
Explain why it is important for magazine to give correct information 
Suggest what the magazine should do
text: I m writing this letter with regards to a request for correction of a mistake in your magazine about Peshawar city.

I am a regular viewer of your magazine for the last 5 years and I enjoy reading it immensely. One week before I saw a piece of information about my native town Peshawar which was not correct. You mentioned the bad condition of motels over here for visitors which is a piece of fake news.

In reality , Peshawar had many motels which are, specially designed for the comfort of travellers and their owners take care of both cleanliness and security to overcome the dissatisfaction of the guests who come and stay here. I am not confirmed from where you got this information, however, this fake news will affect the reputation of the magazine.
I would be grateful to u could either remove this false news or do an excuse to the viewers in the upcoming magazine.
Your prompt response will be awaited.
